content: The new SolidMesh pipelines now have material box mapping that matches the behavior of the previous version.
Renames the ? tab in MicroProfiler HTML dumps to Info for better clarity.
Reduces the CPU usage of Acoustic Simulation's area-density calculations by up to 20%.
Luau's New Type Solver: Error messages for some incorrect types in table literals are now more specific.
Adds Class.MaterialVariant.ColorMapContent, Class.MaterialVariant.MetalnessMapContent, Class.MaterialVariant.NormalMapContent, and Class.MaterialVariant.RoughnessMapContent properties.
Adds Class.TerrainDetail.ColorMapContent, Class.TerrainDetail.MetalnessMapContent, Class.TerrainDetail.NormalMapContent, and Class.TerrainDetail.RoughnessMapContent properties.
Luau's New Type Solver: Fixes some instances of redundant unions in table indexer types.
Adds Mouse KeyCodes for bool InputAction types.
Luau's New Type Solver: Fixes some crashes around aliases containing type assertion expressions.
Fixes a crash that occurred when passing a function from another module as an argument to a generic function.
Adds the Import 3D button to the Home tab of the Next Gen Studio Preview beta feature.
Next Gen Explorer Beta: Fixes "NYI: Parented to nil" and other errors when stopping and starting play solo with certain search terms.
Fixes an issue where CatalogSearchParams.AssetTypes was mistakenly given the wrong type.
Switching between bold and italic tags now updates visuals accordingly when you're working with Rich Text on Studio.
Luau's New Type Solver: Instances of "uninhabited type function" when using math in loops now occur considerably less often.

Fixes an issue where pixels would shift on R15 humanoid heads in non-PBR cases. While final pixels on heads might render slightly offset, this is the correct and expected behavior, ensuring the result in terms of diffuse textures is the same whether a head is rendered with PBR or not.
Fixes an issue where assigning a value to a read-only property would report an error saying "Property is not a valid member of Class" instead of "Property cannot be assigned to".
Fixes an issue where AudioRecorder's recordings could get garbage-collected before they had finished loading into an AudioPlayer.
Luau's New Type Solver: Type functions called on erroneous arguments no longer yield duplicate errors about the type function itself.

Next Gen Explorer Beta: The instance picker no longer deactivates when switching tabs while panels are docked together, or moving the viewport camera. Also, instance picker no longer sets the instance to nil when deactivating.
Next Gen Explorer Beta: Scrolling the Next Gen Explorer while reparenting an Instance now works on Windows even if DPI scaling is not set to 100%.
Fixes an issue where "Failed to apply StyleRule property" warnings appeared in the Output widget when you used the Next Gen Studio Preview beta feature.
